reviews.review_msg: I had her as a TA and though she seems intimidating, she always gave real and super helpful feedback, which personally helped me get a better grade. She does not sugar coat anything and explains things clearly. Super knowledgable and offered having convos with students who were interested in clinical psyc/intervention
She was a TA in 300w. She was extremely condescending and unapproachable. I wouldn't take from her, she doesn't foster an environment that makes learning approachable.
Very tough , and doesn't seem approachable
